TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ManipulationDelta extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含操作事件发生时聚合的转换数据。

span.span: Contains transformation data that is accumulated when manipulation events occur.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含有关操作的位置中的更改的信息。The class contains information about the changes in the position of a manipulation. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 将更改作为解释， ，或。interprets the changes as a , , or . 当发生事件时，使用上的属性对象要转换的对象，应进行操作。When the event occurs on a , use the properties on a object to transform the object that should be manipulated. 类提供两个属性的类型:和。The class provides two properties of type : and . 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 操作响应的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练：创建第一个触控应用程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 该示例应用， ，并属性来移动、 调整大小和旋转。The example applies the , , and properties to move, resize, and rotate a . 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中[演练：创建第一个触控应用程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationDelta](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationdelta)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationDelta](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationdelta)]

summary.span: 获取或设置操作调整的量，用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]表示。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount the manipulation has resized in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The amount the manipulation has resized in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性这两个报表大小调整操作。The and properties both report a resizing manipulation. 两者之间的区别是在其中报告的值的方法。The difference between the two is the way in which the value is reported. 属性报告中的调整大小操作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]。The property reports the resizing manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]. 属性报告作为乘数的值。The property reports the value as a multiplier. 如果为 0.5，操作被解释为 50%的减少的大小。If is 0.5, the manipulation is interpreted as decreasing the size by 50 percent. 如果为 2，操作被解释为 100%增加大小。If is 2, the manipulation is interpreted as increasing the size by 100 percent.

summary.span: 获取或设置操作的旋转度数。

span.span: Gets or sets the rotation of the manipulation in degrees.
The rotation of the manipulation in degrees.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性报告操作被解释为围绕一个轴旋转的方式。The property reports the way a manipulation is interpreted as rotating around an axis. 轴通常是联系人的启动了操作的两个点之间的点。The axis is usually the point between the two points of contact that initiated the manipulation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 该示例应用， ，并属性来移动、 调整大小和旋转。The example applies the , , and properties to move, resize, and rotate a . 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中[演练：创建第一个触控应用程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). summary.span: 获取或设置操作已调整的作为乘数的量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount the manipulation has resized as a multiplier.
The amount the manipulation has resized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性这两个报表大小调整操作。The and properties both report a resizing manipulation. 两者之间的区别是在其中报告的值的方法。The difference between the two is the way in which the value is reported. 属性报告作为乘数的值。The property reports the value as a multiplier. 如果为 0.5，操作被解释为 50%的减少的大小。If is 0.5, the manipulation is interpreted as decreasing the size by 50 percent. 如果为 2，操作被解释为 100%增加大小。If is 2, the manipulation is interpreted as increasing the size by 100 percent. 属性报告中的调整大小操作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]。The property reports the resizing manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 该示例应用， ，并属性来移动、 调整大小和旋转。The example applies the , , and properties to move, resize, and rotate a . 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中[演练：创建第一个触控应用程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). span.span: Gets or sets the linear motion of the manipulation.
The linear motion of the manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性报告操作被解释为在屏幕上水平和垂直移动的方式。The property reports the way a manipulation is interpreted as moving horizontally and vertically on the screen. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 该示例应用， ，并属性来移动、 调整大小和旋转。The example applies the , , and properties to move, resize, and rotate a . 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中[演练：创建第一个触控应用程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
